inclusion.criterion: Hamilton Depression Scale (HAMD questionnaire) is normal or mild to moderate positive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants are asked for their own written informed content for the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients receiving anti-depression therapy during the first 6 months of gestation or during pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with severe depression with scores of no less than 35 points in the HAMD questionnaire
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side. The baby boy is a first child who was born at the age of 38 weeks with NVD from a healthy mother.
